command.text: select "VASShortcodelist"."shortcode" "shortcode" ,"VASShortcodelist"."shortcodeDescription" "shortcodeDescription" ,"VASShortcodelist"."SHORTCODEOWNER" "SHORTCODEOWNER" ,"TheSHORTCODEOWNERownercategoryAcc_"."Acc_Nm" "TheSHORTCODEOWNERownercategoryAcc_Acc_Nm" ,"VASShortcodelist"."VasRegioncode" "VasRegioncode" ,"VasRegion"."VasRegiondescription" "VasRegionVasRegiondescription" ,"VASShortcodelist"."VasCurrenceyCode" "VasCurrenceyCode" ,"VasCurrencey"."VasCurrenceyDescription" "VasCurrenceyVasCurrenceyDescription" ,"VASShortcodelist"."typeofshortcode" "typeofshortcode" ,"typeofshort"."typeofshortDescription" "typeofshorttypeofshortDescription" ,"typeofshortIncomeAcc_"."Acc_Nm" "typeofshortIncomeAcc_Acc_Nm" ,"typeofshortIncomeAcc_Clsacc_"."Acc_Nm" "typeofshortIncomeAcc_Clsacc_Acc_Nm" ,"typeofshortIncomeAcc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Nm" "typeofshortIncomeAcc_Acc_BndAcc_Nm" ,"typeofshortCostAcc_"."Acc_Nm" "typeofshortCostAcc_Acc_Nm" ,"typeofshortCostAcc_Clsacc_"."Acc_Nm" "typeofshortCostAcc_Clsacc_Acc_Nm" ,"typeofshortCostAcc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Nm" "typeofshortCostAcc_Acc_BndAcc_Nm" ,"VASShortcodelist"."isysRentpercentage" "isysRentpercentage" ,"VASShortcodelist"."Rate" "Rate" ,"VASShortcodelist"."operatorShare" "operatorShare" ,"VASShortcodelist"."sistershare" "sistershare" ,"VASShortcodelist"."Cpshare" "Cpshare" ,"VASShortcodelist"."Subprovidershare" "Subprovidershare" ,"VASShortcodelist"."IsysShare" "IsysShare" ,"VASShortcodelist"."VASoperatorcode" "VASoperatorcode" ,"VASoperator"."VASoperatorcodeDescription" "VASoperatorVASoperatorcodeDescription" ,"VASoperatorAcc_"."Acc_Nm" "VASoperatorAcc_Acc_Nm" ,"VASoperatorAcc_Clsacc_"."Acc_Nm" "VASoperatorAcc_Clsacc_Acc_Nm" ,"VASoperatorAcc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Nm" "VASoperatorAcc_Acc_BndAcc_Nm" ,"VASoperatorVasCurrencey"."VasCurrenceyDescription" "VASoperatorVasCurrenceyVasCurrenceyDescription" ,"VASoperatorVASopCategory"."VASopCategoryDescription" "VASoperatorVASopCategoryVASopCategoryDescription" ,"VASoperatorVasRegion"."VasRegiondescription" "VASoperatorVasRegionVasRegiondescription" ,"VASShortcodelist"."Taxs" "Taxs" ,"VASShortcodelist"."VasCurrenceyPrice" "VasCurrenceyPrice" ,"VASShortcodelist"."shortcodeold" "shortcodeold" ,"shortcodeold"."shortcodeDescription" "shortcodeoldshortcodeDescription" ,"shortcodeoldVasCurrencey"."VasCurrenceyDescription" "shortcodeoldVasCurrenceyVasCurrenceyDescription" ,"shortcodeoldVASoperator"."VASoperatorcodeDescription" "shortcodeoldVASoperatorVASoperatorcodeDescription" ,"shortcodeoldVASoperatorAcc_"."Acc_Nm" "shortcodeoldVASoperatorAcc_Acc_Nm" ,"shortcodeoldVASoperatorVasCurrencey"."VasCurrenceyDescription" "shortcodeoldVasRegionVasRegiondescription" ,"shortcodeoldtypeofService"."typeofServiceDescription" "shortcodeoldtypeofServicetypeofServiceDescription" ,"shortcodeoldtypeofServicetypeofServiceCategory"."typeofServiceCategoryDescription" "shortcodeoldtypeofServicetypeofServiceCategorytypeofServiceCategoryDescription" ,"shortcodeoldSHORTCODEOWNER"."SHORTCODEOWNERName" "shortcodeoldSHORTCODEOWNERSHORTCODEOWNERName" ,"shortcodeoldSHORTCODEOWNERownercategory"."SHORTCADEOWNERMain" "shortcodeoldSHORTCODEOWNERownercategorySHORTCADEOWNERMain" ,"shortcodeoldtypeofshort"."typeofshortDescription" "shortcodeoldtypeofshorttypeofshortDescription" ,"shortcodeoldtypeofshortIncomeAcc_"."Acc_Nm" "shortcodeoldtypeofshortIncomeAcc_Acc_Nm" ,"shortcodeoldtypeofshortCostAcc_"."Acc_Nm" "shortcodeoldtypeofshortCostAcc_Acc_Nm" ,"VASShortcodelist"."notes1001" "notes1001" ,"VASShortcodelist"."notes10011" "notes10011" ,"VASShortcodelist"."notes10012" "notes10012" ,"VASShortcodelist"."notes10013" "notes10013" ,"VASShortcodelist"."notes10014" "notes10014" ,"VASShortcodelist"."notes10015" "notes10015" ,"VASShortcodelist"."notes10016" "notes10016" ,"VASShortcodelist"."notes10017" "notes10017" ,"VASShortcodelist"."notes10018" "notes10018" from "dbo"."VASShortcodelist" "VASShortcodelist" left join "dbo"."VASSHORTCODEOWNERS" "TheSHORTCODEOWNER" on "VASShortcodelist"."SHORTCODEOWNER" = "TheSHORTCODEOWNER"."SHORTCODEOWNER" left join "dbo"."VASOWNERCATLIST" "TheSHORTCODEOWNERownercategory" on "TheSHORTCODEOWNER"."ownercategory" = "TheSHORTCODEOWNERownercategory"."SHORTCADEOWNER" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "TheSHORTCODEOWNERownercategoryAcc_" on "TheSHORTCODEOWNERownercategory"."Acc_no" = "TheSHORTCODEOWNERownercategoryAcc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."VasRegionlist" "VasRegion" on "VASShortcodelist"."VasRegioncode" = "VasRegion"."VasRegioncode" left join "dbo"."VasCurrenceylist" "VasCurrencey" on "VASShortcodelist"."VasCurrenceyCode" = "VasCurrencey"."VasCurrenceyCode" left join "dbo"."VAStypeofshortcodelist" "typeofshort" on "VASShortcodelist"."typeofshortcode" = "typeofshort"."typeofshortcode" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "typeofshortIncomeAcc_" on "typeofshort"."IncomeAcc_no" = "typeofshortIncomeAcc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."GLmfbab" "typeofshortIncomeAcc_Clsacc_" on "typeofshortIncomeAcc_"."Clsacc_No" = "typeofshortIncomeAcc_Clsacc_"."Acc_Bab" left join "dbo"."GLmfband" "typeofshortIncomeAcc_Acc_Bnd" on "typeofshortIncomeAcc_"."Acc_Bnd" = "typeofshortIncomeAcc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Bnd" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "typeofshortCostAcc_" on "typeofshort"."CostAcc_no" = "typeofshortCostAcc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."GLmfbab" "typeofshortCostAcc_Clsacc_" on "typeofshortCostAcc_"."Clsacc_No" = "typeofshortCostAcc_Clsacc_"."Acc_Bab" left join "dbo"."GLmfband" "typeofshortCostAcc_Acc_Bnd" on "typeofshortCostAcc_"."Acc_Bnd" = "typeofshortCostAcc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Bnd" left join "dbo"."VASServiceType" "ThetypeofService" on "VASShortcodelist"."typeofService" = "ThetypeofService"."typeofService" left join "dbo"."VAStypeofServiceCategory" "ThetypeofServicetypeofServiceCategory" on "ThetypeofService"."typeofServiceCategory" = "ThetypeofServicetypeofServiceCategory"."typeofServiceCategory" left join "dbo"."VASOperrcodelist" "VASoperator" on "VASShortcodelist"."VASoperatorcode" = "VASoperator"."VASoperatorcode" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "VASoperatorAcc_" on "VASoperator"."Acc_no" = "VASoperatorAcc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."GLmfbab" "VASoperatorAcc_Clsacc_" on "VASoperatorAcc_"."Clsacc_No" = "VASoperatorAcc_Clsacc_"."Acc_Bab" left join "dbo"."GLmfband" "VASoperatorAcc_Acc_Bnd" on "VASoperatorAcc_"."Acc_Bnd" = "VASoperatorAcc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Bnd" left join "dbo"."VasCurrenceylist" "VASoperatorVasCurrencey" on "VASoperator"."VasCurrenceyCode" = "VASoperatorVasCurrencey"."VasCurrenceyCode" left join "dbo"."VASOperatorCategory" "VASoperatorVASopCategory" on "VASoperator"."VASopCategory" = "VASoperatorVASopCategory"."VASopCategory" left join "dbo"."VasRegionlist" "VASoperatorVasRegion" on "VASoperator"."VasRegioncode" = "VASoperatorVasRegion"."VasRegioncode" left join "dbo"."VASShortcodelist" "shortcodeold" on "VASShortcodelist"."shortcodeold" = "shortcodeold"."shortcode" left join "dbo"."VasCurrenceylist" "shortcodeoldVasCurrencey" on "shortcodeold"."VasCurrenceyCode" = "shortcodeoldVasCurrencey"."VasCurrenceyCode" left join "dbo"."VASOperrcodelist" "shortcodeoldVASoperator" on "shortcodeold"."VASoperatorcode" = "shortcodeoldVASoperator"."VASoperatorcode" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "shortcodeoldVASoperatorAcc_" on "shortcodeoldVASoperator"."Acc_no" = "shortcodeoldVASoperatorAcc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."VasCurrenceylist" "shortcodeoldVASoperatorVasCurrencey" on "shortcodeoldVASoperator"."VasCurrenceyCode" = "shortcodeoldVASoperatorVasCurrencey"."VasCurrenceyCode" left join "dbo"."VASOperatorCategory" "shortcodeoldVASoperatorVASopCategory" on "shortcodeoldVASoperator"."VASopCategory" = "shortcodeoldVASoperatorVASopCategory"."VASopCategory" left join "dbo"."VasRegionlist" "shortcodeoldVASoperatorVasRegion" on "shortcodeoldVASoperator"."VasRegioncode" = "shortcodeoldVASoperatorVasRegion"."VasRegioncode" left join "dbo"."VasRegionlist" "shortcodeoldVasRegion" on "shortcodeold"."VasRegioncode" = "shortcodeoldVasRegion"."VasRegioncode" left join "dbo"."VASServiceType" "shortcodeoldtypeofService" on "shortcodeold"."typeofService" = "shortcodeoldtypeofService"."typeofService" left join "dbo"."VAStypeofServiceCategory" "shortcodeoldtypeofServicetypeofServiceCategory" on "shortcodeoldtypeofService"."typeofServiceCategory" = "shortcodeoldtypeofServicetypeofServiceCategory"."typeofServiceCategory" left join "dbo"."VASSHORTCODEOWNERS" "shortcodeoldSHORTCODEOWNER" on "shortcodeold"."SHORTCODEOWNER" = "shortcodeoldSHORTCODEOWNER"."SHORTCODEOWNER" left join "dbo"."VASOWNERCATLIST" "shortcodeoldSHORTCODEOWNERownercategory" on "shortcodeoldSHORTCODEOWNER"."ownercategory" = "shortcodeoldSHORTCODEOWNERownercategory"."SHORTCADEOWNER" left join "dbo"."VAStypeofshortcodelist" "shortcodeoldtypeofshort" on "shortcodeold"."typeofshortcode" = "shortcodeoldtypeofshort"."typeofshortcode" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "shortcodeoldtypeofshortIncomeAcc_" on "shortcodeoldtypeofshort"."IncomeAcc_no" = "shortcodeoldtypeofshortIncomeAcc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "shortcodeoldtypeofshortCostAcc_" on "shortcodeoldtypeofshort"."CostAcc_no" = "shortcodeoldtypeofshortCostAcc_"."Acc_No"
